member.name: T:Cake.Npm.NpmAddUserAliases
member.summary: Npm Install aliases

member.name: M:Cake.Npm.NpmAddUserAliases.NpmAddUser(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.Action{Cake.Npm.AddUser.NpmAddUserSettings})
member.summary: Adds user using the settings returned by a configurator.

example.para: Base url of package registry ('npm adduser --registry=http://myregistry.example.com')
Scope assoicated with the user ('npm adduser --scope=@cake')
Indicates that all requests to the given registry should include authorization information ('npm adduser --registry=http://private-registry.example.com --always-auth')
What authentication strategy to use ('npm adduser --auth-type=legacy')
Use specific log level ('npm adduser')

member.name: M:Cake.Npm.NpmAddUserAliases.NpmAddUser(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Npm.AddUser.NpmAddUserSettings)
member.summary: Adds user using the specified settings.

example.para: Base url of package registry ('npm adduser --registry=http://myregistry.example.com')
Scope assoicated with the user ('npm adduser --scope=@cake')
Indicates that all requests to the given registry should include authorization information ('npm adduser --registry=http://private-registry.example.com --always-auth')
What authentication strategy to use ('npm adduser --auth-type=legacy')
Use specific log level ('npm adduser')

member.name: T:Cake.Npm.NpmCiAliases
member.summary: Npm Ci aliases

member.name: M:Cake.Npm.NpmCiAliases.NpmCi(Cake.Core.ICakeContext)
member.summary: Cis all packages for the project in the current working directory.

member.name: M:Cake.Npm.NpmCiAliases.NpmCi(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.Action{Cake.Npm.Ci.NpmCiSettings})
member.summary: Cis packages using the settings returned by a configurator.

example.para: Use specific log level ('npm ci')

member.name: M:Cake.Npm.NpmCiAliases.NpmCi(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Npm.Ci.NpmCiSettings)
member.summary: Cis packages using the specified settings.

example.para: Use specific log level ('npm ci')

member.name: T:Cake.Npm.NpmInstallAliases
member.summary: Npm Install aliases

member.name: M:Cake.Npm.NpmInstallAliases.NpmInstall(Cake.Core.ICakeContext)
member.summary: Installs packages for the project in the current working directory.

member.name: M:Cake.Npm.NpmInstallAliases.NpmInstall(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String[])
member.summary: Install one or more packages to the project in the current working directory.

member.name: M:Cake.Npm.NpmInstallAliases.NpmInstall(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.Action{Cake.Npm.Install.NpmInstallSettings})
member.summary: Installs packages using the settings returned by a configurator.

example.para: Install packages in a specific working directory ('npm install')
Force fetching of remote resources ('npm install --force')
Install gulp globally ('npm install gulp -g')
Ignore devDependencies while installaling packages of the project in the current directory ('npm install --production')
Use specific log level ('npm install')

member.name: M:Cake.Npm.NpmInstallAliases.NpmInstall(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Npm.Install.NpmInstallSettings)
member.summary: Installs packages using the specified settings.

example.para: Install packages in a specific working directory ('npm install')
Force fetching of remote resources ('npm install --force')
Install gulp globally ('npm install gulp -g')
Ignore devDependencies while installaling packages of the project in the current directory ('npm install --production')
Use specific log level ('npm install')

member.name: T:Cake.Npm.NpmLogLevel
member.summary: Details the npm log levels

member.name: F:Cake.Npm.NpmLogLevel.Default
member.summary: Uses log level as defined by the running Cake script.

member.name: F:Cake.Npm.NpmLogLevel.Silent
member.summary: -s, --silent or --loglevel silent

member.name: F:Cake.Npm.NpmLogLevel.Warn
member.summary: -q, --quiet or --loglevel warn

member.name: T:Cake.Npm.NpmPackAliases
member.summary: Npm Pack aliases

member.name: M:Cake.Npm.NpmPackAliases.NpmPack(Cake.Core.ICakeContext)
member.summary: Creates a npm package from the current working directory. Package will be created in the current working directory.

member.name: M:Cake.Npm.NpmPackAliases.NpmPack(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a npm package from a specific source. Package will be created in the current working directory.
member.param: Source to pack. Can be anything that is installable by npm, like a package folder, tarball, tarball url, name@tag, name@version, name, or scoped name.

member.name: M:Cake.Npm.NpmPackAliases.NpmPack(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,System.Action{Cake.Npm.Pack.NpmPackSettings})

member.summary: Creates a npm package using the specified settings. Package will be created in the current working directory.
